title: [ARURF] Ban  or adjust Tryndamere and Garen
body:
I mean, Riot guys permabanned Sona and Ryze, these spinning champions are just annoying, maybe a little adjust? Jax and yi can be handed with cc but those two (Garen and Trynda)  just spam their spin and boom, half hp gone besides their survability. 
Please, thanks.
